channel.title: Middle Eastern on An Attempt to Organise my Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Middle Eastern on An Attempt to Organise my Mind

item.title: Tabbouleh
item.description: Recipe taken from BBC Good Food - Tabbouleh with Halloumi and Broccoli. Ingredients 140g couscous 300g broccoli florets 6 spring onions , finely sliced 150g cherry tomato, quartered large bunch parsley, finely chopped small bunch mint, finely chopped juice 2 lemons, zest of ½ lemon 2½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil 1½ tbsp harissa or sriracha 1 tbsp clear honey 2 x 250g packs halloumi cheese, cut into 1cm-thick slices 25g toasted flaked almond or fresh.

item.title: Falafel
item.description: Recipe taken from: Recipe taken from: Gimme Some Oven - Falafel Ingredients 1 (15-ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained 1 cup fresh parsley leaves, tightly-packed 1 cup fresh cilantro leaves, tightly-packed 1⁄2 cup diced red or yellow onion 1⁄3 cup flour (such as all-purpose, white whole wheat, chickpea, or a 1:1 gluten-free flour) 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice 1 1⁄2 teaspoons baking powder 1 1⁄2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 teaspoon fine sea salt 1⁄2 teaspoon black pepper 6 small garlic cloves, peeled and roughly chopped 4–6 tablespoons high-heat oil (such as avocado oil, grapeseed oil or vegetable oil) for serving: pita bread, chopped lettuce, sliced red onions, sliced tomatoes, tzatziki sauce, tahini sauce and/or hummus Method Roughly purée your ingredients.
